alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 6:48PM EDT until April 10 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. For the Susquehanna River New York...including Unadilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River At Unadilla. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Basement flooding and some first floor dwellings between Main Street and River Road are affected by flooding. This includes properties on Hopkins, Church, Dart and Mill Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The river stage at Unadilla has been rising for the last 24 hours, though the rate of rise has been slower during the last 12 hours. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet later this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
